vision: A modern, responsive e-commerce template for Thelia 3 with Alpine.js interactivity and Tailwind CSS styling

target_audience.primary: E-commerce store owners using Thelia 3 who need a modern, responsive front-office template for their online shop
secondary: Web developers and agencies building Thelia-based e-commerce sites
Small-to-medium business owners managing their own online stores
Thelia community members looking for modern template alternatives

phases.name: Foundation & Quick Wins
phases.description: Address critical gaps, fix known issues, and implement quick wins that improve conversion and user experience immediately

milestones.title: Account Management Complete
milestones.description: Users can fully manage their account including password changes

milestones.title: SEO & Performance Optimized
milestones.description: Structured data and Core Web Vitals optimizations implemented

milestones.title: Checkout Conversion Improved
milestones.description: Guest checkout and mobile checkout enhancements reduce cart abandonment

phases.name: Customer Engagement
phases.description: Expand customer engagement features to increase retention, repeat purchases, and competitive differentiation

milestones.title: Social Commerce Ready
milestones.description: Customers can share wishlists and product reviews are live

milestones.title: Smart Notifications
milestones.description: Price drop alerts and back-in-stock notifications driving re-engagement

phases.name: Advanced Features & Polish
phases.description: Add advanced shopping features and UX polish that differentiate Moderna from basic templates

milestones.title: Advanced Shopping Experience
milestones.description: Product comparison, quick view, and advanced search enhance product discovery

milestones.title: Theme Customization
milestones.description: Dark mode and theming options available

phases.name: Future Vision & Developer Experience
phases.description: Long-term improvements for progressive web capabilities, testing infrastructure, and developer adoption

milestones.title: PWA-Ready
milestones.description: Progressive Web App capabilities for offline access and app-like experience

milestones.title: Developer-Friendly
milestones.description: Comprehensive test suite and documentation for community adoption

features.title: Password Change API Implementation
features.description: Implement the backend API endpoint for password change functionality in the customer account section. Currently marked as TODO in account.html.twig.
features.rationale: Users cannot currently change their passwords through the account interface, which is a basic security and UX requirement. This addresses a known gap identified in the codebase.
acceptance_criteria: Users can change their password from the account settings page
Password validation includes current password verification
Strong password requirements are enforced (min 8 chars, mixed case, numbers)
Success/error messages display appropriately
Session remains valid after password change
user_stories: As a customer, I want to change my password so that I can maintain account security

features.title: Newsletter Backend Integration
features.description: Connect the existing newsletter subscription form to Thelia's newsletter module or external email marketing services (Mailchimp, SendinBlue).
features.rationale: The newsletter form exists in the template but isn't connected to any backend, making it non-functional. Newsletter capture is critical for customer retention and marketing.
acceptance_criteria: Newsletter form submits to Thelia newsletter module via API
AJAX submission without page reload
Duplicate email prevention with appropriate messaging
GDPR-compliant consent checkbox
Success confirmation message displays after subscription
user_stories: As a store owner, I want to capture customer emails so that I can send marketing communications
As a customer, I want to subscribe to newsletters so that I can receive updates about sales and new products

features.title: SEO Structured Data (Schema.org)
features.description: Implement JSON-LD structured data for products, breadcrumbs, organization, and reviews following Schema.org standards for improved search engine visibility.
features.rationale: Missing SEO optimizations was identified as a known gap. Structured data improves search result appearance with rich snippets and can increase click-through rates by 30%+. Addresses PrestaShop pain point about themes lacking SEO optimizations.
acceptance_criteria: Product pages include Product schema with name, description, price, availability, images
Breadcrumb schema implemented on all pages with hierarchy
Organization/LocalBusiness schema on homepage
AggregateRating schema ready for when reviews are implemented
Structured data validates in Google's Rich Results Test
No errors in Google Search Console for structured data
user_stories: As a store owner, I want my products to appear with rich snippets in Google so that I get more clicks from search results

features.title: Core Web Vitals Optimization
features.description: Optimize for Google's Core Web Vitals metrics (LCP, FID, CLS) with lazy loading, critical CSS inlining, image optimization, and reduced JavaScript blocking time.
features.rationale: WooCommerce themes suffer from severe performance issues (20+ second load times). Moderna's competitive advantage is its lightweight stack. This feature cements that differentiation and improves SEO rankings.
acceptance_criteria: PageSpeed Insights score >= 90 on mobile
LCP < 2.5 seconds
FID < 100ms (INP < 200ms)
CLS < 0.1
Images use modern formats (WebP) with fallbacks
Critical CSS inlined in document head
JavaScript deferred or async where possible
user_stories: As a store owner, I want my site to load fast so that customers don't abandon before seeing products
As a customer, I want pages to load quickly so that I can browse products efficiently

features.title: Enhanced Guest Checkout
features.description: Streamline guest checkout flow by reducing form fields to essential minimum, removing forced account creation, and adding express checkout option.
features.rationale: 70%+ cart abandonment is driven by checkout friction. Baymard research shows 28% abandon due to forced account creation. This addresses the market gap around checkout UX identified in competitor analysis.
acceptance_criteria: Guest checkout available without account creation
Only essential fields required (name, email, address, payment)
Optional account creation offered post-purchase
Form auto-fills from browser data where available
Progress indicator shows checkout steps clearly
Mobile-optimized form inputs (appropriate keyboards, large tap targets)
user_stories: As a first-time customer, I want to checkout without creating an account so that I can complete my purchase quickly
As a returning customer, I want the option to save my details for faster future checkouts

features.title: Mobile Checkout Optimization
features.description: Optimize the entire checkout flow for mobile devices with touch-friendly inputs, simplified forms, and mobile-specific UX patterns.
features.rationale: 63% of users abandon due to preventable mobile UX issues. Mobile commerce accounts for 70%+ of transactions. This is a critical market gap affecting PrestaShop and WooCommerce competitors.
acceptance_criteria: All checkout inputs have minimum 44px tap targets
Appropriate mobile keyboards activated (numeric for phone, email for email)
Address autocomplete integration (Google Places or similar)
Single-column layout on mobile
Sticky CTA buttons for key actions
Checkout completes in < 3 minutes average on mobile
user_stories: As a mobile shopper, I want to complete checkout easily on my phone so that I don't have to wait until I'm at a computer

features.title: Product Reviews & Ratings System
features.description: Implement a complete product review and rating system with moderation, helpful votes, and display on product pages. Integrate with structured data.
features.rationale: No product reviews/ratings backend integration was identified as a known gap. Reviews increase conversion rates by 270% for products with 5+ reviews. Built-in reviews eliminate need for paid modules (addressing PrestaShop pain point).
acceptance_criteria: Customers can submit star ratings (1-5) and text reviews
Reviews require purchase verification option available
Admin moderation panel for review approval
Helpful/not helpful voting on reviews
Average rating displayed on product cards and detail pages
Review schema markup for rich snippets
Pagination for products with many reviews
user_stories: As a customer, I want to read reviews before purchasing so that I can make informed decisions
As a customer who purchased, I want to share my experience so that I can help others
As a store owner, I want to moderate reviews so that I can maintain quality content

features.title: Wishlist Sharing Feature
features.description: Allow customers to share their wishlists via unique URL, social media, or email. Enable gift registries and collaborative wishlists.
features.rationale: Expanding wishlist functionality addresses market gap #2. Social sharing drives new customer acquisition. Gift registries are particularly valuable for special occasions and increase average order value.
acceptance_criteria: Unique shareable URL generated for each wishlist
Social sharing buttons (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Email)
Shared wishlist viewable without login
Option to mark items as purchased (for gift registries)
Multiple wishlists per customer (e.g., 'Birthday', 'Holiday')
Privacy settings (public, private, link-only)
user_stories: As a customer, I want to share my wishlist with friends so that they know what gifts I'd like
As a gift buyer, I want to see what someone wants so that I can buy them something they'll love

features.title: Price Drop Alerts
features.description: Notify customers via email when items in their wishlist drop in price. Include configurable thresholds and immediate or digest notification options.
features.rationale: Price alerts re-engage customers and drive conversions from the wishlist. This feature typically requires paid plugins in PrestaShop/WooCommerce, making it a competitive advantage for Moderna.
acceptance_criteria: Opt-in checkbox on wishlist items for price alerts
Email notification sent when price drops by configurable threshold
Option for immediate or daily digest notifications
Direct link to product in notification email
Unsubscribe link in all notification emails
Admin dashboard showing price alert subscriptions
user_stories: As a customer, I want to be notified when wishlist items go on sale so that I don't miss deals
As a store owner, I want to re-engage customers when I reduce prices so that I can increase sales

features.title: Back-in-Stock Notifications
features.description: Allow customers to subscribe to notifications when out-of-stock products become available again. Manage notification queue and prevent overselling.
features.rationale: Back-in-stock notifications capture demand for unavailable products and drive sales when inventory is replenished. Another feature typically requiring paid plugins in competitor platforms.
acceptance_criteria: Notify me button displayed on out-of-stock product pages
Email/SMS notification when product is back in stock
FIFO notification queue to prevent overselling
Admin report showing back-in-stock demand
Automatic notification when stock updated
Limit notifications to available quantity
user_stories: As a customer, I want to be notified when a sold-out item returns so that I can purchase it
As a store owner, I want to understand demand for out-of-stock items so that I can make inventory decisions

features.title: One-Page Checkout Option
features.description: Implement an alternative single-page checkout layout that displays all checkout steps simultaneously for faster completion.
features.rationale: Checkout optimization can increase conversions by 35%+. One-page checkout reduces perceived effort and allows customers to see the complete process upfront, reducing abandonment.
acceptance_criteria: All checkout steps visible on single page (accordion or column layout)
Live order summary updates as information is entered
Validation happens inline without page submission
Configurable option to use single-page or multi-step checkout
Mobile-responsive single-page layout
Keyboard navigation works correctly through all fields
user_stories: As a customer, I want to see the entire checkout process at once so that I know exactly what's required
As a store owner, I want to A/B test checkout layouts so that I can optimize conversions

features.title: Icon System Consolidation
features.description: Consolidate and standardize the icon system across the template. Remove inline SVGs, implement a consistent icon sprite or component system.
features.rationale: Technical debt item identified in worktree 007. Improves maintainability, reduces bundle size, and ensures visual consistency across the template.
acceptance_criteria: All icons use consistent system (SVG sprite or icon component)
Inline SVGs removed from Twig templates
Icons are easily swappable/customizable
Icon documentation with available icons listed
Reduced total icon asset size
Accessibility labels on all icons
user_stories: As a developer, I want a consistent icon system so that I can easily add or modify icons

features.title: Product Comparison Feature
features.description: Allow customers to select multiple products and compare their attributes, specifications, and prices side by side.
features.rationale: No product comparison feature was identified as a known gap. Comparison tools help customers make decisions, particularly for technical or similar products, reducing decision paralysis.
acceptance_criteria: Add to compare button on product cards and detail pages
Compare drawer/bar showing selected products (max 4)
Side-by-side comparison table with product attributes
Highlight differences between products
Add to cart directly from comparison view
Comparison persists across sessions (localStorage)
user_stories: As a customer, I want to compare similar products so that I can choose the best option for my needs

features.title: Product Quick View Modal
features.description: Implement a quick view modal that allows customers to see product details, select variants, and add to cart without leaving the catalog page.
features.rationale: Quick view reduces friction in the browsing-to-purchase journey. Customers can evaluate products faster, improving the shopping experience and potentially increasing add-to-cart rates.
acceptance_criteria: Quick view button on product cards
Modal displays product images, title, price, description excerpt
Variant selection available in modal
Add to cart from modal with AJAX
Link to full product page from modal
Mobile-friendly modal design
Keyboard accessible (Escape to close)
user_stories: As a customer, I want to quickly preview products without leaving the catalog so that I can browse faster

features.title: Advanced Search with Filters
features.description: Enhance the search functionality with AJAX-powered results, faceted filtering (price, category, attributes), and search suggestions.
features.rationale: Improved search helps customers find products faster. Faceted search is expected in modern e-commerce and reduces time-to-purchase, addressing UX expectations set by major platforms.
acceptance_criteria: AJAX search with instant results as user types
Search suggestions based on popular searches
Filter results by category, price range, attributes
Sort options (relevance, price, newest)
Search history for logged-in users
No results page with helpful suggestions
Search analytics for store owners
user_stories: As a customer, I want to filter search results so that I can find exactly what I'm looking for
As a store owner, I want to understand what customers search for so that I can optimize my catalog

features.title: Dark Mode Support
features.description: Implement a dark color scheme option that respects system preferences and allows manual toggle. Include smooth transition animations.
features.rationale: No dark mode support was identified as a known gap. Dark mode is increasingly expected by users, reduces eye strain, and can save battery on OLED devices.
acceptance_criteria: Dark mode toggle in header/footer
Respects prefers-color-scheme system setting by default
User preference persisted in localStorage
Smooth transition animation between modes
All UI elements properly styled in dark mode
Images and graphics adjusted for dark backgrounds where needed
user_stories: As a customer, I want to use dark mode so that I can browse comfortably in low-light conditions

features.title: Product Recommendations Engine
features.description: Display personalized product recommendations based on browsing history, purchase history, and related products.
features.rationale: Product recommendations increase average order value and improve product discovery. Leverages the existing recently viewed products feature to provide more sophisticated suggestions.
acceptance_criteria: Related products section on product detail pages
Frequently bought together suggestions
Personalized recommendations based on browsing history
Cross-sell suggestions in cart
Recommendations algorithm configurable by admin
Fallback to popular/featured products for new visitors
user_stories: As a customer, I want to see related products so that I can discover items I might like
As a store owner, I want to increase average order value through intelligent recommendations

features.title: Enhanced 404 Page
features.description: Improve the 404 error page with search functionality, popular products, and helpful navigation to reduce bounce rate from dead links.
features.rationale: Technical debt item identified in worktree 008. A well-designed 404 page can recover potentially lost traffic and guide users back to productive browsing.
acceptance_criteria: Clear, friendly error message
Search box prominently displayed
Links to popular categories
Featured/popular products displayed
Back to homepage button
Consistent styling with rest of template
user_stories: As a customer who hit a broken link, I want helpful options so that I can find what I was looking for

features.title: Progressive Web App (PWA) Support
features.description: Implement PWA capabilities including service worker for offline access, add-to-homescreen prompt, and app-like experience on mobile.
features.rationale: PWA provides app-like experience without app store distribution. Enables offline browsing, faster repeat visits, and push notifications - differentiating from competitors locked into traditional web delivery.
acceptance_criteria: Service worker caches critical assets for offline access
Web app manifest with proper icons and theme colors
Add to homescreen prompt on mobile
Offline fallback page when network unavailable
Background sync for cart operations
Push notification capability (opt-in)
user_stories: As a mobile customer, I want to install the store as an app so that I can access it quickly
As a returning customer, I want instant loading from cache so that I don't wait for network

features.title: Automated Testing Suite
features.description: Implement comprehensive automated testing including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for critical user journeys.
features.rationale: No automated tests was identified as a known gap. Testing infrastructure is essential for maintainability, preventing regressions, and enabling confident refactoring.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests for JavaScript components (Alpine.js stores, utilities)
Integration tests for API interactions
E2E tests for critical paths (add to cart, checkout, login)
Tests run in CI/CD pipeline
Minimum 70% code coverage target
Test documentation and contribution guide
user_stories: As a developer, I want automated tests so that I can make changes confidently without breaking existing functionality

features.title: Developer Documentation Portal
features.description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers including installation guide, customization tutorials, component API reference, and contribution guidelines.
features.rationale: Good documentation drives community adoption. As an open-source project, Moderna's success depends on developers being able to understand, customize, and contribute to the template.
acceptance_criteria: Getting started guide with installation steps
Customization guide (colors, typography, layouts)
Component documentation with props and examples
Alpine.js store and utility documentation
Twig template override guide
Contributing guidelines and code standards
Changelog maintained for all releases
user_stories: As a developer, I want clear documentation so that I can customize the template for my client's needs
As a Thelia community member, I want to contribute so that I can help improve Moderna

features.title: Multi-Currency Support Enhancement
features.description: Enhance multi-currency support with real-time currency switching, proper formatting, and integration with currency conversion services.
features.rationale: International e-commerce requires proper multi-currency support. While Thelia supports multiple currencies, the template UX for switching and displaying currencies can be improved.
acceptance_criteria: Currency switcher in header with flags/symbols
Prices update without page reload (AJAX)
Proper currency formatting based on locale
Currency preference persisted
Integration with exchange rate API (optional)
Cart totals recalculated on currency change
user_stories: As an international customer, I want to see prices in my local currency so that I understand the cost
